name: Extract NIB
description: NIB (Nomor Induk Berusaha) or (Business Identification Number) is the official identity of a business actor issued through the Online Single Submission (OSS) system, functioning as the basic legality of the business, replacing SIUP/TDP/API, as well as a gateway to obtain further business permits in Indonesia.

business_name.description: Legal business name or company name

registration_number.description: Business registration number or company ID

business_type.description: Type of business entity (PT, CV, UD, Individual, etc.)

issuing_authority.description: Government office that issued the registration

business_activities.description: List of business activities or KBLI codes

name: Extract Passport
description: A passport is an official, government-issued booklet that certifies a person's identity and nationality, allowing them to travel internationally, enter foreign countries, and return to their home country.

name: Extract Identity Card
description: An identity card (KTP) is an official document, that containing personal details like name, photo, date of birth, and unique ID number, issued by a government or organization for identification, access, and services.
responseBody:
{
  "data": {
    "analysis_id": "ID that will be responded from the system",
    "status": "COMPLETED",
    "results": {
      "ktp_issuing_province": "example string",
      "ktp_issuing_city_regency": "example string",
      "nik": "example string",
      "full_name": "example string",
      "gender": "Male",
      "blood_type": "A",
      "date_of_birth": "2026-01-09",
      "place_of_birth": "example string",
      "address": "example string",
      "rt_rw": "example string",
      "ward_or_village": "example string",
      "subdistrict": "example string",
      "religion": "example string",
      "marital_status": "example string",
      "job_occupation": "example string",
      "citizenship": "example string",
      "valid_until": "example string",
      "issued_date": "2026-01-09",
      "issued_city_regency": "example string",
      "nationality": "example string"
    }
  }
}

ktp_issuing_city_regency.description: City or regency that issued the KTP

nik.description: NIK (Nomor Induk Kependudukan) - 16 digit identification number

full_name.description: Complete full name as written on KTP

rt_rw.description: RT and RW of address information

ward_or_village.description: Ward or Village (Kelurahan atau desa) of address information

issued_date.description: Date when identity card was issued

issued_city_regency.description: City or regency where identity card was issued
